summary.span: 代表在固定檢視模式 (一次顯示一頁內容) 中檢視動態內容的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control for viewing flow content in a fixed viewing mode that shows content one page at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只允許一個做為子項目。 allows only one as a child element. 顯示內容頁-一次檢視模式。 shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode. 類似的控制項， ，會以連續捲動模式顯示內容。A similar control, , shows content in continuous scrolling mode. 兩者和都有固定的特定檢視模式。Both and are fixed to a particular viewing mode. 相反地，包含可讓使用者動態選擇各種檢視模式功能 (所提供列舉型別)，但代價是不良的執行效能高於或。On the other hand, includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the enumeration), at the cost of being poorer performing than or . 如下圖所示控制項，其預設值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。The following illustration shows a control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentPageViewer")![Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer") - **內容區域**-[內容] 區域顯示的內容所指定屬性。**Content Area** - The content area displays the contents of the specified by the property. - **工具列**-預設工具列停駐下方內容區域中，而裝載的巡覽頁面，以及變更縮放層級的控制項。**Toolbar** - The default toolbar is docked underneath the content area, and hosts controls for navigating pages, and changing the zoom level. - **頁面導覽控制項**-頁面導覽控制項包括按鈕以移至下一頁 （向下箭號） 或上一頁 （向上箭頭），以及目前的頁碼和總頁數的指示器。**Page Navigation Controls** - The page navigation controls include a button to jump to the next page (the down arrow) or previous page (the up arrow), as well as indicators for the current page number and total number of pages. - **縮放控制項**-縮放控制項可讓使用者以增加或減少的縮放層級，按一下加號或減號按鈕，分別。**Zoom Controls** - The zoom controls enable the user to increase or decrease the zoom level by clicking the plus or minus buttons, respectively. 縮放控制項也包括調整縮放層級的滑桿。The zoom controls also include a slider for adjusting the zoom level. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . - **搜尋**-使用者可以使用 Ctr + F 鍵盤快速鍵，或您可以使用切換搜尋文字方塊中，用來尋找在內容中的字串。**Search** - The user can use the Ctr+F keyboard shortcut or you can use to toggle a search textbox that is used to find strings within the content. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information. ## Examples 下列範例會定義如上圖所示。The following example defines the pictured in the figure above. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FlowDocumentPageViewerXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentpageviewerxaml)]

summary.span: 切換 [尋找] 對話方塊。

span.span: Toggles the **Find** dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，Ctrl + F，請提供切換的鍵盤快速鍵**尋找**對話方塊。By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog. 下圖顯示**尋找** 對話方塊上的UI 的預設值。The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a with default UI. ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentPageViewer 的尋找對話方塊](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentPageViewer 的尋找對話方塊")![Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer") 預設值**尋找** 對話方塊包含讓您輸入搜尋文字欄位，以及用於按鈕**尋找下一個**，**找上一個**，和**選項**.The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**. 下列**尋找**預設會提供選項：The following **Find** options are provided by default: - 全字拼寫須相符Match whole word only - 大小寫須相符Match case - 比對讀音符號Match diacritic - 比對 kashidaMatch kashida - 比對 a hamzaMatch alef hamza

span.span: Arguments of the event.

summary.span: 每當未處理的 路由事件達到其路由中的這個類別時呼叫。

span.span: Called whenever an unhandled routed event reaches this class in its route.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 如果在繼承的中繼類別已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫基底實作。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 這個方法的目的是有點類似[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它會提供方法來處理從衍生的類別，而不是執行個體處理常式的類別處理常式與相符的事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，比對的事件是路由的事件。In this case, the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能已引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式，因此您的實作必須接受事件引數的項目考慮來源屬性 （和不應該嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event might have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子類別路由收到事件時，無法呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Subclasses of could call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一個可能的案例是取得事件的引數，並謹慎地將事件標示為已處理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定為 0，透明，看不到。If you set the to 0, the is transparent and is not visible. 如果您設定1.0 或更新版本，以是不透明，而且選取文字不是可見。If you set the to 1.0 or greater, the is opaque and the selected text is not visible. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，設定屬性設為粉紅色，並設定0.7 的屬性。The following example creates a , sets the property to pink, and sets the property to 0.7. summary.span: 取得或設定 目前的縮放層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level for the .

value.span: 目前的縮放層級 (以百分比表示)。

span.span: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 預設值為 100.0 (縮放層級 100%)。

span.span: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 縮放層級的值受限於和屬性。The zoom level is constrained by the values of the and properties. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following example shows how to use this property. span.span: Gets or sets the zoom increment.

value.span: 目前的縮放增量 (以百分比表示)。

span.span: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 預設值為 10.0 (縮放增量 10%)。

span.span: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 縮放增量是由此百分比層級增加或減少的時機或執行命令，分別。The zoom increment is the percentage by which the level is increased or decreased when the or commands are executed, respectively. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following example shows how to use this property.
